All 199 Kathmandu Restaurants» Thee Fast Food Restaurant and Bar Thamel, Tridevi Marg , Kathmandu , Nepal Got a photo? Add it. Ranked #117 of 199 restaurants in Kathmandu 1 Review Cuisines: American, Indian, Nepali Restaurant details Update restaurant details Write a Review 1 review from our community UUUberMan Reviewer 5 reviews Reviews in 2 cities “Good, cheap food, shisha and tongba!” Reviewed January 22, 2011 via mobile I was really lucky to find this place. They are much cheaper than every other place in Thamel (a veg Nepali set costs 100 rupees, shisha is 200, and tongba is 100). It's not the nicest looking place, but the staff is friendly, the food is good and the prices are hard to pass up. To make it better, their... More Was this review helpful? Yes Problem with this review? See 3 more reviews by UUUberMan for Kathmandu 1-1 of 1 review 1 Been to Thee Fast Food Restaurant and Bar? Share your experiences!
